title: Wanted - PSA 6 Tris Speaker & Nap Lajoie T-206
author: Sniper'sGiants

posts.post_title: Wanted - PSA 6 Tris Speaker & Nap Lajoie T-206
posts.post_content:
Not super concerned about the brand but I am looking to purchase a PSA 6 or greater copy of Tris Speaker and Nap Lajoie portrait version from the T-206 set.  Very new to this site and to T206 collecting but I have been on ebay for years and have been collecting in the hobby since 1988, ebay ID is pearljam.  Not interested in OC versions or other qualifiers.

Thanks, Wes...
Someone has to own these guys, fire me a message.
